testcase.name: increment the value for a single counter in the collection

failure.message: Given a counter "onecounter" with a value of "1" was added to the collection: Failed asserting that 409 is identical to 201.

testcase.name: lock a single counter in the collection and try to increment it

failure.message: Then I should see an error "counter with name onecounter is locked": Failed asserting that '{"name":"onecounter","value":1,"status":"active"}' matches PCRE pattern "/counter with name onecounter is locked/i".

testcase.name: Getting the value for a single counter in the collection

failure.message: Then the value returned should be "0": Failed asserting that '1' matches PCRE pattern "/0/i".
